title: Electoral Process (Local Government Elections) (Election Date and Time of Poll) Order, 2021
content:
10th September, 2021 Statutory Instruments 641
GOVERNMENT OF ZAMBIA
STATUTORY INSTRUMENT NO. 75 OF 2021
The Electotral Process Act, 2016
(Act No. 35 of 2016)
The Electotral Process (Local Government Elections)
(Election Date and Time of Poll) Order, 2021
IN EXERCISE of the powers contained in section 125 of the Electoral
Process Act, 2016, the following Order is made:
1. This Order may be cited as the Electoral Process (Local Title
Government Elections) (Election Date and Time of Poll) Order,
2021.
2. A candidate for election as Council Chairperson and Date and
time of
Councillor in a district and ward set out in the Schedule shall lodge
nominations
a nomination with the returning officer on Thursday, 30th for elections
September, 2021, between 0900 hours and 1500 hours.
3. The Campaign period shall commence on Thursday, 30th Campaign
September, 2021 at 1500 hours and close at 1800 hours on Period
Wednesday, 20th October, 2021.
4. (1) The poll for the election of a Council Chairperson and Election
Date and
Councillor in a district and ward set out in the Schedule shall take
Time of Poll
place on Thursday, 21st October, 2021, between 0600 hours and
1800 hours.
(2) A poll shall not be taken in a district or ward if only one
candidate is validity nominated.
Copies of this Statutory Instrument can be obtained from the Government Printer,
P.O. Box 30136, 10101, Lusaka, Price K4.00 each
